text:
Backend Engineer | New York, NY, USA | Onsite | Full-time

Please apply at: http://grnh.se/5xasb21

This is an opportunity to join a highly credible and well-funded (over $10 million) stealth tech startup in NYC. Weâ€™re looking for someone with a history of building amazing applications to join our team. You'll be working with a group of very passionate engineers and designers that are dedicated to building a successful mobile application. The Founding team is made up of members from Twitter, eBay, Gilt, Glamsquad, Yahoo, Apple, and Dropbox and our advisory board include senior executives from Google, Facebook, Microsoft, Twitter, Square and Adobe.

Requirements: - 5+ years developing and shipping at large-scale internet companies - Strong foundation in algorithms, data structures, and complexity analysis - Fluency in Scala - Production experience with relational databases (MySQL) - B.S. in Computer Science
